page.title: 09LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: {WESTERHAM TRANSPORT This business all started with a small garage with people asking the owner to store and deliver their goods. As the business expanded, he bought two lorries. Three years ago, the firm moved to larger premises in Edenbridge. There are now ten employees, including six who drive lorries and vans. They pack and deliver such goods as :_ medical goods, blood bottles, wheelchairs, candles, lampshades, toys and books and deliver to supermarkets, hospitals and restaraunts. They have three weeks holiday after working there for 12 months. After four years this is increased to four weeks. The firm closes over the Christmas break for up to ten days....by Sarah Galloway.
